title: 101. Severed Artery
content:
You come to an excavated chamber. In one direction, it recedes into complete darkness; in the other, it ends abruptly. Judging by the tumbled boulders and the state of the Estian transit line, there was a cave-in here long ago, causing the line to twist and rip like the green branches of a sapling.

If Kal Iver is in play and you have not BESTED KAL, go to 102.1.

If Kal Iver is in play and you have BESTED KAL, go to 102.2.
